Title: Relates to decisions by the state board on electric generation; repealer
Summary: Relates to decisions by the state board on electric generation; requires approval through public referendum prior to certification for establishing a major electric generating facility.
LawCode: Amd ยง168, rpld & add ยง170, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to decisions by the state board on electric generation; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
